text: Provides 1u (1 unit of bandwidth. Play only one Tower card each turn).
Play this card only on a space with a Radio Tower. Destroy that tower. Provides 1u for each mecha you control named Radio Relay. (1 unit of bandwidth. Play only one Tower card each turn).
(No abilities.)

Sacrifice a neighbouring mecha you control: Add that mecha's durability to this mecha.
Pierce, Reach.
Pierce, Range 2.
Pierce, Range 3.
Reach. Sacrifice a neighbouring mecha you control: This mecha gains Range 3 this turn.
This mecha can't attack. When this mecha moves, it can't move next turn.
Armour 1. This mecha may not attack and move in the same turn.
Armour 2. This mecha may not attack and move in the same turn.
Armour 3, Reach.
Flight.
Flight. When this mecha attacks, the target can't attack next turn.
Flight. When this mecha attacks, the target must move next turn.
One mecha you control can attack an extra time this turn.
One mecha you control can move an extra space this turn.
One mecha you control gains Reach this turn.
Sacrifice a Tower you control: One mecha an opponent controls can't attack this turn.
Discard another card from your hand. If you do, any one mecha you control can move an extra space this turn.
Play this card on the battlefield with 2 time counters on it. At the beginning of your main phase, if there are no time counters on this card, neighbouring mechas gain Speed 3.
Look at any one player's hand, then draw a card.
Put two Armour counters on any mecha in your entry zone.
